sqlGroup.name: user
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT `user`.*,`userInfo`.street street,`userInfo`.gender gender, `userInfo`.zip_code zip_code,`province`.name province,`city`.name city,`county`.name county,`userRole`.role_id role_id

FROM sec_user `user` LEFT JOIN sec_user_info `userInfo` ON(`user`.id=`userInfo`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `province` ON(`userInfo`.province_id=`province`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `city` ON(`userInfo`.city_id=`city`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `county` ON(`userInfo`.county_id=`county`.id) LEFT JOIN sec_user_role `userRole` ON (`user`.id=`userRole`.user_id)

sqlGroup.name: role
sqlGroup.sql: FROM sec_role `role` WHERE `role`.id IN (SELECT `userRole`.role_id FROM sec_user_role `userRole` WHERE `userRole`.user_id=?)
FROM sec_role `role` INNER JOIN (SELECT left_code,right_code FROM sec_role WHERE id=?) `code` ON (`role`.left_code > `code`.left_code AND `role`.right_code < `code`.right_code)

sqlGroup.name: permission
sqlGroup.sql: FROM sec_permission `permission` WHERE `permission`.id IN (SELECT `role_permission`.permission_id FROM sec_role_permission `role_permission` WHERE `role_permission`.role_id=?)
